product_name: ColourPopFresh Kiss Glossy Peptide Lip Balm
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeColourPop's Fresh Kiss Glossy Lip Balm is a cushiony lip balm infused with lip-boosting peptides and hyaluronic acid to nourish and hydrate lips, leaving them soft, smooth, and glossy. Drench lips in glowy shine in clear or lightly tinted shades in yummy flavors.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrates, smooths & softens dry lipsLightly tinted for a sheer hint of colourPlush, cushiony textureGlossy, high-shine finishEasy squeeze tube for on-the-go applicationAvailable in multiple yummy flavorsKey IngredientsPeptides: Soften & nourish lipsHyaluronic acid: Deeply hydrates lipsItem 2633272How To UseWear alone or over your fave lip colour for a hydrating, glossy finish.IngredientsStrawberry Milk: Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Diisostearyl Malate, Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Octyldodecanol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Paraffin, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Microcrystalline Wax, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Flavor, Propylene Carbonate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Isohexadecane, Aspartame, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Xanthan Gum, Aluminum Hydroxide, Tripeptide-1, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Red 6 Lake (CI 15850), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 7 (CI 15850).
how_to_use: Wear alone or over your fave lip colour for a hydrating, glossy finish.
ingredients: Strawberry Milk: Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate

reviews.headline: Best lip gloss I own
reviews.comments: I got the cherry type, and I love it. It's a beautiful color, good scent, and it's not sticky like other lip glosses. I use it for almost all occasions, just love it.

reviews.headline: Buy it!
reviews.comments: I will definitely be buying this again‚Äînot only does it moisturize, but it also smells great and is affordable. It has a smooth texture too, which I love because I don't like sticky lip gloss

reviews.headline: Amazing lip balm
reviews.comments: I was pleasantly surprised how soft my lips were after using the strawberry milk lip balm. I love the texture and consistency. It's nice and soft and smooth and smells delicious. It goes on nicely. I definitely want to try other flavors and would recommend this 100% only thing I was disappointed is that I was hoping it was a little bit more pink but other than that not really that disappointed. I actually highly recommend these. I'll be definitely trying other flavors in the future. Price point is pretty good too. it's comparable to way more expensive brands and out shines the expensive ones.

reviews.headline: I love this!!!
reviews.comments: I got the vanilla cake gloss and i love it. Definitely buying more of colors.  It isnt sticky and i love the shine.

reviews.headline: Not a great smell/flavor
reviews.comments: Cherry Glaze color: Was really excited about this as the color was fun and it looked good on. Also, I love the applicator, but the smell/flavor is just so fake it is very off putting. It smells like cherry cough syrup.

reviews.headline: Pretty color
reviews.comments: Very pretty color great shine, but doesn't taste too good

reviews.headline: Beautiful product but not for me
reviews.comments: I really liked the color and quality of this product and typically I like a scented product, but these had candy-like smells that were too strong for me. The watermelon and cherry smell very similar to jolly ranchers or starburst. If you dont like scented products you wont like this. If you like scent, be prepared that this is pretty strong!

reviews.headline: I will continue to buy these
reviews.comments: These lip balms are the best lip balms I have tried, they are better than summer Fridays, laneige, and Dior and so much more affordable. The one thing I will say is the cherry is pink and not red, and the watermelon is not as bright of a pink as you would think. Overall great product and cheap pricing, would recommend

reviews.headline: The best lip balms!
reviews.comments: These are seriously the best. I now own 3 Vanilla Cake, 1 Strawberry Milk, and 1 Caramel Latte. üòç I plan on having at least one of all of them!

reviews.headline: This was amazing!
reviews.comments: Absolutely perfect!

reviews.headline: Love this product!
reviews.comments: I can't get over this smell! Every since I smelled it i felt like I was in a dream! It feels so hydrating on the lips and refreshing. I would definitely recommend!

reviews.headline: Hydrating
reviews.comments: The smell is a bit artificial but it is so hydrating. I like it more than my summer fridays. Definitely the best drugstore lip balm that I have tried.

reviews.headline: Ehhh‚Ä¶
reviews.comments: Beautiful scent,but doesn't last. Less than 10 minutes and uts gone‚Ä¶ need to reapply too many times throughout the day. Not worth more than 4$ honestly.

reviews.headline: SO MESSY
reviews.comments: Leaked in my pencil case, and when I opened it up it driped everywhere.

reviews.headline: The Best!
reviews.comments: I LOVE this lipbalm! Its so affordable and works so well and even better than some high-end expensive lip balms I own! I actually reach for this one the most. It's non-greasy, super hydrating, and I love the scent and color options they have!

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Love this

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I originally wanted the ELF lip gloss that is similar but they were sold out. Being that I love ColorPop, I figured I would try this one. Glad I did. I love the color as well as the texture. It's not too thick or sticky.

reviews.headline: YUMMY
reviews.comments: I really like these not sticky at all

reviews.headline: So pretty
reviews.comments: Very flavorful lol not a thick or sticky consistency. Get it!

reviews.headline: Must have
reviews.comments: Absolutely love this product. I bought rhe watermelon sugar scent and after the first try on, i went back in store and bought vanilla one. They both smell soooo bomb!!!! I love wearing the vanilla one at work and the watermelon sugar one when I'm out and about. I plan on buying more of these hidden gems.

faceoff_positive.comments: I bought the Caramel Latte and Cherry Glaze flavors of this lip balm and I have to say, they are incredible! I have been a fan of the Summer Fridays lip butter balm for a while now, but am always on the hunt for more affordable options. Well, I found them! Both of them are sheer tints which I love, I like being able to still see the color of my own lips through them. The shade of Caramel Latte is a perfect nude brown and mixes with the pink of my lips perfectly! It also smells literally just like a caramel latte. The Cherry Glaze shade is an amazing juicy, sheer red and will be perfect for summer! The scent reminds me of a cherry-flavored Tootsie Pop! Neither of them taste like anything which I honestly like. I would prefer my lip products to smell good and not have a flavor. Both are amazing and I would definitely recommend!
faceoff_positive.headline: Amazing Affordable Option!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I didnt buy these from ulta but I just wanted to say, these are grainy. I don't know if colourpop sent me a bad batch but thry are all grainy and the grains taste like salt or something. I also think the majority of the smells are just bad. Strawberry, mango, and watermelon smelt like plastic and fake fruit like a scratch and sniff. Choco one was good! Still grainy. And I 1) don't live somewhere cold and 2) am not putting in extra work for a lip balm. I think naturium is the better value for your money with this one.
faceoff_negative.headline: Grainy

rollup.name: Fresh Kiss Glossy Peptide Lip Balm
